Posts.Content: i hate them, in fact they make me very stressed, however, i now got myself a spray gun with a fan attatchment, and soon as i feel one coming on i start spraying, its a very fine mist and really does the job! everynight i spray all my sheets pillows and hair and neck , tuck down into that feels grt, i also saw on a shopping channel a thing called the chillow pillow looks good, gonna get one off ebay for summer, check them out, there around Â£25, but well worth it, i was actually waiting til i get mine pre summer in case they go cheaper LOL. u must try the spray though. really good.
